name: yt-music
title: Youtube Music
description: Search and play music from YouTube's vast library directly through Raycast. Find your favorite songs, albums, playlists, and artists without leaving your keyboard
author: ayovictor

commands.name: search
commands.title: Search
commands.subtitle: Youtube Music
commands.description: Search for music from YouTube's library and select what to play. Use the dropdown menu to filter your search by songs, albums, playlists, or artists

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
